item.title: Vance Will Have to Choose Between Tucker and the Presidency
item.description: Sooner or later, the ambitious vice president will need to decide which he values more.

item.title: The Cost of Humoring Trump Comes Due
item.description: As his Greenland myopia further strains the postwar order, MAGA International and D.C. Republicans alike feel the consequences.

item.title: After Being Excoriated by Trump-Appointed Judge, Halligan Is Removed by DOJ
item.description: Rather than answer their vitriol ‘tit-for-tat,’ Judge Novak turned to, and shredded, ‘the few points’ raised by the DOJ that resembled legal argument.

item.title: In Venezuela, Which Leader Will Trump Choose?
item.description: Acting President Delcy Rodríguez has the early advantage, but democratic María Corina Machado offers better long-term prospects.

item.title: Young Mothers Delivers Europe’s Future
item.description: The Dardenne brothers document social development.
